common.i18n_demo_description: Showcasing Pagemaker CMS multilingual support features
common.欢迎使用 Pagemaker CMS，这里是您的内容管理中心: Welcome to Pagemaker CMS, your content management center
common.管理您的页面模板，创建和编辑页面内容: Manage your page templates, create and edit page content
common.创建您的第一个页面开始使用: Create your first page to get started
common.确定要删除这个页面吗？此操作不可撤销。: Are you sure you want to delete this page? This action cannot be undone.

errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed. Please check your network connection and try again
errors.NETWORK_TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again later
errors.NETWORK_OFFLINE: Network is offline. Please check your network connection
errors.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Login has expired. Please log in again
errors.AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid username or password. Please try again
errors.AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED: You don't have permission to access this resource
errors.VALIDATION_REQUIRED_FIELD: Please fill in the required fields
errors.VALIDATION_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid input format. Please check and try again
errors.VALIDATION_FILE_TOO_LARGE: File size exceeds limit. Please select a smaller file
errors.SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR: Server encountered an issue. Please try again later
errors.SERVER_MAINTENANCE: System is under maintenance. Please visit later
errors.SERVER_OVERLOAD: Server is busy. Please try again later
errors.CONFLICT_VERSION: Data has been modified by another user. Please refresh and try again
errors.CONFLICT_DUPLICATE: This data already exists. Please check and try again
errors.EDITOR_SAVE_FAILED: Failed to save page. Please check your network connection and try again
errors.EDITOR_LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load page. Please refresh the page and try again
errors.EDITOR_MODULE_INVALID: Module configuration is invalid. Please check the configuration and try again
errors.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource does not exist
errors.抱歉，您访问的页面不存在。: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.不存在或您没有访问权限: does not exist or you don't have access permission
errors.删除页面失败，请重试: Failed to delete page, please try again

editor.title: Page Editor
editor.selectModuleHint: Please select a module in the canvas to edit its properties
editor.创建和编辑您的页面内容: Create and edit your page content
editor.从左侧模块列表中拖拽模块到此处，或点击下方按钮开始创建页面内容。: Drag modules from the left module list here, or click the button below to start creating page content.
editor.从左侧拖拽模块到此处: Drag modules from the left here
editor.此操作无法撤销，请确认是否继续。: This operation cannot be undone, please confirm to continue.
editor.您确定要删除这个模块吗？删除后将无法恢复。: Are you sure you want to delete this module? It cannot be recovered after deletion.
editor.确定要删除选中的模块吗？: Are you sure you want to delete the selected module?
editor.以下是可用的键盘快捷键：: Here are the available keyboard shortcuts:
editor.请在画布中选择一个模块以编辑其属性: Please select a module in the canvas to edit its properties
editor.该模块类型暂不支持预览: This module type is not supported for preview
editor.快捷键在输入框中不会生效，确保焦点在编辑器主区域。: Shortcuts don't work in input fields, make sure focus is in the main editor area.
editor.生成完整的HTML代码，可直接粘贴到乐天店铺后台使用: Generate complete HTML code that can be directly pasted into Rakuten shop backend
editor.点击重新生成按钮生成HTML代码: Click the regenerate button to generate HTML code
editor.点击\"重新生成\"按钮生成HTML代码: Click the "Regenerate" button to generate HTML code
editor.默认导出纯内容HTML，适合直接粘贴到乐天店铺后台: Export content-only HTML by default, suitable for direct pasting into Rakuten shop backend
editor.勾选完整HTML文档可导出包含头部的完整HTML文件: Check Full HTML Document to export complete HTML file with head section
editor.勾选\"完整HTML文档\"可导出包含头部的完整HTML文件: Check "Full HTML Document" to export complete HTML file with head section
editor.建议在粘贴前先在预览中确认页面效果: Recommend confirming page effects in preview before pasting
editor.如果样式显示异常，请确保乐天后台支持自定义CSS: If styles display abnormally, ensure Rakuten backend supports custom CSS
editor.乐天规则：手机页面不允许使用H1-H6标签: Rakuten Rule: H1-H6 tags are not allowed on mobile pages
editor.当前文本已有链接，是否要移除链接？: The current text already has a link. Do you want to remove the link?
editor.检测到移动端页面，已自动启用乐天HTML约束：使用<p>标签、<font>标签和:
Mobile page detected, Rakuten HTML constraints have been automatically enabled. Use

tags, tags, and limited HTML tags only.
editor.💡 修改属性会自动标记为未保存: 💡 Modifying properties automatically marks as unsaved
editor.支持 JPG、PNG、GIF、WebP 格式: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats
editor.支持 JPG、PNG、GIF、WebP 格式，文件大小不超过5MB: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats, file size no more than 5MB
editor.从本地上传新图片或从R-Cabinet中选择已有图片: Upload new image from your computer or select existing image from R-Cabinet
HTML code will be shown here...
editor.在右侧属性面板中配置图片和文本: Configure image and text in the right property panel
editor.请在右侧属性面板中配置: Please configure in the right property panel
editor.请在画布中点击图片区域添加: Click on the image area in the canvas to add
editor.在画布中点击图片区域可添加图片: Click on the image area in the canvas to add image
editor.点击图片或文本区域直接编辑: Click on the image or text area to edit directly

auth.请填写完整的用户名和密码: Please fill in complete username and password
auth.登录失败，请稍后重试: Login failed, please try again later
